application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
(T1) Yew (Taxus baccata) - Reduce height by 1.5m to suitable growth points; prune back lateral branches by up to 0.6m
(T2) Yew (Taxus baccata) - Reduce height by 0.6m to suitable growth point; prune back lateral branches by up to 0.6m with emphasis on branches overhanging pavement side
(G1) 6x Cherry Laurel (Prunus laurosiferus) - Fell to ground 2x smaller trees to ground level; reduce height of remaining trees by 2.5m to suitable unions; reduce all inbound branch growth by up to 0.5m
(T3 - T4) 2x Monterey Cypress (Cupressus macrocarpa) - Reduce height by 1m to previous cut point; trim back front face by 0.75m to green growth foliage
(T5) Mountain Ash (Sorbus acuparia) - Reduce crown by 25% to suitable growth points; light reduce inbound branch length by 0,5m ONLY; remove all deadwood
(T6 - T7) 2x Monterey Cypress (Cupressus macrocarpa) - Fell both trees to ground level 
(T8) Monterey Cypress (Cupressus macrocarpa) - Reduce height to previous cut; trim back front face by 0.75m to green growth foliage
(T9) Pear (Pyrus) - Reduce crown by 25% (1.3m) to suitable growth points; reduce lateral branch length to match; remove all dead wood branches and any low crossing
(T10) Pear (Pyrus) - Section as close to ground fell to ground level as possible (pool filtration equipment in front of tree base)
(T11) Monterey Cypress (Cupressus macrocarpa) - Reduce height to previous cut point; trim back all inbound branches by up to 1.3m to green foliage points to shape and tidy
